segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of the message and to transmit function, type and number of the message.
DTM, A segment to indicate date and time of the preparation of the message.
RFF, A segment to indicate a message reference number.
NAD, A segment to identify the liner service operating or responsible for a particular vessel/voyage.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the means of transport and related details.

segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to identify a means of transport and discharge voyage number.
LOC, A segment to identify the locations to which the following information applies.
DTM, A segment to indicate date and time of events in local time, else the time zone specifier is to be used.
RFF, A segment to identify the loading voyage number.
FTX, A segment to transmit general information about vessel/voyage.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments containing information about the total numbers of equipment and/or goods by location.

segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify locations (ports) relevant to the equipment or goods carried.
GID, A segment to identify the number of packages of the goods.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments containing information about the type of equipment and the number of units.

segment.documentation: EQD, A segment to identify the type of equipment to which the following totals apply. Only transport equipment size/type coded or plain language is used here further to identify the type of equipment.
EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units.
